接口的使用
javax.servlet.AsyncContext

  • 使用AsyncContext的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    javax.servlet
    The javax.servlet package contains a number of classes and interfaces that describe and define the contracts between a servlet class and the runtime environment provided for an instance of such a class by a conforming servlet container.
    org.apache.catalina.connector  
    org.apache.catalina.core  
    org.apache.catalina.websocket  

    • javax.servlet中AsyncContext的使用

      返回AsyncContext的javax.servlet中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      AsyncContext ServletRequestWrapper.getAsyncContext()
      The default behavior of this method is to return getAsyncContext() on the wrapped request object.
      AsyncContext ServletRequest.getAsyncContext()
      Get the current AsyncContext.
      AsyncContext AsyncEvent.getAsyncContext() 
      AsyncContext ServletRequestWrapper.startAsync()
      The default behavior of this method is to return startAsync() on the wrapped request object.
      AsyncContext ServletRequest.startAsync() 
      AsyncContext ServletRequestWrapper.startAsync(ServletRequest servletRequest, ServletResponse servletResponse)
      The default behavior of this method is to return startAsync(Runnable) on the wrapped request object.
      AsyncContext ServletRequest.startAsync(ServletRequest servletRequest, ServletResponse servletResponse) 
      参数类型为AsyncContext的javax.servlet中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      AsyncEvent(AsyncContext context) 
      AsyncEvent(AsyncContext context, ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response) 
      AsyncEvent(AsyncContext context, ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, java.lang.Throwable throwable) 
      AsyncEvent(AsyncContext context, java.lang.Throwable throwable) 

    • org.apache.catalina.connector中AsyncContext的使用

      返回AsyncContext的org.apache.catalina.connector中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      AsyncContext RequestFacade.getAsyncContext() 
      AsyncContext Request.getAsyncContext() 
      AsyncContext RequestFacade.startAsync() 
      AsyncContext Request.startAsync() 
      AsyncContext RequestFacade.startAsync(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response) 
      AsyncContext Request.startAsync(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response)

      实现AsyncContext的org.apache.catalina.core中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  AsyncContextImpl

      返回AsyncContext的org.apache.catalina.websocket中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      已过时。
